practice_phrases: 似乎什么都不工作了。
Nothing seems to be working.
似乎一切都不工作了。
It seems nothing is working.
对不起，似乎什么都不工作了。
I'm sorry, nothing seems to be working.
没问题，似乎什么都不工作了。
No problem, nothing seems to be working.
我不知道为什么似乎什么都不工作了。
I don't know why nothing seems to be working.
她说似乎什么都不工作了，一切都好。
She said nothing seems to be working, everything is okay.
当然，我的朋友认为似乎什么都不工作了。
Of course, my friend thinks nothing seems to be working.
我不知道为什么似乎什么都不工作了，但我很感激你帮助我。
I don't know why nothing seems to be working, but I'm grateful to you for helping.
这是我朋友想要和我们见面的地方，因为似乎什么都不工作了。
This is where my friend wanted to meet us, because nothing seems to be working.
当你和他们一起做困难的事情时似乎什么都不工作了，我需要这么早离开。
When you do difficult things with them nothing seems to be working, I need to leave so early.

lego: since we tried to fix it
自从我们试图修理它以来
practice_phrases: 自从我们试图修理它以来。
Since we tried to fix it.
自从我们试图修理它以来，没问题。
Since we tried to fix it, no problem.
自从我们试图修理它以来，一切都好。
Since we tried to fix it, everything is okay.
自从我们试图修理它以来，似乎什么都不工作了。
Since we tried to fix it, nothing seems to be working.
对不起，自从我们试图修理它以来，我需要这么早离开。
I'm sorry, since we tried to fix it, I need to leave so early.
自从我们试图修理它以来，你为什么不再高兴了？
Since we tried to fix it, why are you not happy any more?
这是我朋友想要和我们见面的地方，自从我们试图修理它以来。
This is where my friend wanted to meet us, since we tried to fix it.
自从我们试图修理它以来，我很感激你帮助我，似乎什么都不工作了。
Since we tried to fix it, I'm grateful to you for helping, nothing seems to be working.
当然你可以问她，因为自从我们试图修理它以来，她是我的朋友。
Of course you can ask her, because since we tried to fix it, she's my friend.
这和我们之前谈论的是同一件事，自从我们试图修理它以来，我看不到你试图给我看的东西。
It's the same thing as we were talking about earlier, since we tried to fix it, I can't see what you're trying to show me.
试图修理它。
Tried to fix it.
我们试图修理它。
We tried to fix it.
对不起，我们试图修理它。
I'm sorry, we tried to fix it.
我们试图修理它，没问题。
We tried to fix it, no problem.
自从我们试图修理它以来，一切都好。
Since we tried to fix it, everything is okay.
我们试图修理它，但似乎什么都不工作了。
We tried to fix it, but nothing seems to be working.
我们试图修理它，我很感激你帮助我，你为什么不再高兴了？
We tried to fix it, I'm grateful to you for helping, why are you not happy any more?
这是我朋友想要和我们见面的地方，因为我们试图修理它。
This is where my friend wanted to meet us, because we tried to fix it.
当她看到我感到紧张时，她非常友好，因为我们试图修理它但什么都不工作。
She was very kind when she saw me feeling nervous, because we tried to fix it but nothing is working.
经常说话比完美更重要，即使我们试图修理它，自从我们之前谈论的。
It's more important to talk often than to be perfect, even though we tried to fix it, since what we were talking about earlier.
修理。
Fix.
修理它。
Fix it.
我们试图修理它。
We tried to fix it.
我需要修理它。
I need to fix it.
对不起，我不能修理它。
I'm sorry, I can't fix it.
你能帮我修理它吗？
Can you help me fix it?
我很感激你帮助我修理它，你真好。
I'm grateful to you for helping me fix it, that's very kind of you.
自从我们试图修理它以来，似乎什么都不工作了，这么早。
Since we tried to fix it, nothing seems to be working, so early.
这是我朋友想要和我们见面的地方，因为她想修理它。
